initiate_counterintelligence.title: Shadow Operations
initiate_counterintelligence.description: Security Chief Kade sets up the surveillance operation: 'We'll monitor their communications, track their movements, and document their contacts. This is delicate work - if they realize we're onto them, they'll either disappear or accelerate their timeline. We need to be invisible until we're ready to strike.'

choices.text: 'How long until we have actionable intelligence?'
'What if they're planning to strike before we gather enough evidence?'
'We should coordinate this surveillance with other crisis teams.'
'I need to report this investigation to central command.'
